name: Stephania Assimopoulos
title: Show Host
bio: Hi there! I'm Stephania, and I am a PhD student at the Department of Medical Biophysics, studying cardiac and brain abnormalities in Autism Spectrum Disorder. This is my third Season at Raw Talk, and I am a show host and content creator. Our goal is to bring to you the most exciting science stories in the best possible way! Tune in because some amazing stuff is in store for season 5. Until then, keep it raw!
